709524f-a.text:
East side of Sixth Avenue, 48th to 47th Street, from S.W. corner
49th Street.
Septewmer, 7, 1931.
F.L.Sperr, Photographer.

709547f-a.text:
Sixth Ave., east side, north from and including West 47th Street, and showing the new Radio City structures rising. Uncompleted skyscraper is the R.C.A. Building. Other units shown of the Center, are, the 16-story Sixth Ave. Entrance to the R.C.A. Building and the 31-story R.K.O. Building.
October 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

709550f-b.text:
(1)
Sixth Ave., east side, north from West 48th Street, as seen from the N.W. corner of 47th Street. Shown under construction is a unit
of Radio City.
February 14, 1932.
P. L. Soerr.
(2)
The same, slightly later. Note completion of 1st unit and partial completion of 2nd and 3rd units.  E 5 a)~ .7 --July 24, 1932.
P. L Sperr.
